post.title: Day 10 Qingdao Day 1
post.author: Jackson Hayes
post.content:
So here I am in Qingdao, the roughing it portion of my trip is officially over (unless plans change and I feel like going back out in to the boonies.) I have spent my entire time here since arriving at the hostel, getting caught up on blogging and uploading pictures / fighting my website code. I am basically on top of it now. Still working on image uploading, but there should be enough new stuff to keep you all entertained.

I am past the half way point in the trip. I was quite home sick the last couple days because I didn't have sufficient Internet connection nor time to call back home. That has been solved and dealt with properly. Now I can continue onwards. I plan on using today as a day to recoup and do nothing. That and you know figure out where I am going to next. 

Check in later for more about my invasion of Beijing from the north.
